articles.title: What residuals are — and why Hollywood actors and writers are striking over them - The Associated Press
articles.description: Residuals are an essential issue in the current strikes of Hollywood's actors and screenwriters. The term refers to long-term payments negotiated by unions that contributors receive for movies and TV series that are viewed after their initial release. The pay…
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) The residuals are out there, read a picket sign held by actor David Duchovny, echoing the tagline of his TV series, The X Files.
